comfort.comm: Air conditioning is appreciated during the hot month of August.

cont.itemA: Air conditioning very welcome during sizzling August.

room.comm: Rooms are generally clean and well-maintained, with basic but spacious accommodations.

cont.itemA: Small but perfectly adequate room - no view but then I wasn't paying for one! Clean with good beds.
cont.itemB: Rooms are basic but spacious and clean.

staff_service.comm: The staff are friendly and helpful.

cont.itemA: Friendly and helpful staff - the free map was very welcome!
cont.itemB: The location was great and the employees were very helpful.

location.comm: The hotel is in a great location, convenient to transport.

cont.itemA: Great location close to the station but still in a quiet backwater.
cont.itemB: The hotel is very conveniently located from the San Marco stop and faces the Grand Canal.

itemA.dining: Breakfast in the garden is a must. Other venues nearby offer good and reasonably priced food.
itemA.price: The only hotel where the mini bar prices seem more favorable than outside.

itemB.dining: While the restaurant is good, there are better options in nearby trattorias and bars.
itemB.room: Our room had a stunning view of the ocean.
itemB.staff_service: The staff were not necessarily friendly, but they were not rude either.
